revised_title: Chemical Interpretation of Mendelian Factors for Flower-Colour in Antirrhinum
tldr: The authors investigate the chemical basis of Mendelian factors for flower color in Antirrhinum, identifying the ivory pigment as apigenin and the yellow pigment as luteolin. They also suggest that anthocyanins are derived from flavones, with individual anthocyanins differing based on the flavone they are derived from.
